rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a decorative archway that adheres to Chettinad design aesthetics and respects Vastu principles by facing the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room featuring traditional Chettinad motifs, ample natural lighting from east and north exposures. Incorporates Vastu guidelines by positioning seating areas toward the center.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated with the living room for a seamless family dining experience. Designed to encourage social interaction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene master bedroom with east-facing window to ensure natural morning light. Decorated in traditional Chettinad style.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest bedroom designed for occasional visitors, with a west-facing window in line with the plot orientation.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: A bright and airy space designed for the children with north-east exposure to ensure positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen designed in a U-shaped layout to maximize space and incorporate traditional Chettinad elements. Positioned optimally as per Vastu guidelines for south or east exposure.

rooms.name: Dining Kitchen
rooms.description: An integrated dining kitchen area for family meals with an open layout ensuring a connected atmosphere.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Separate living space for the staff with essential amenities; designed to ensure privacy while maintaining connectivity.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: A quiet study area for work or reading, located in a well-lit corner following Vastu recommendations for mental clarity.

rooms.name: Balcony/Veranda
rooms.description: An open balcony that enhances the living experience and offers a private outdoor space, designed with Vastu in mind to face north or east.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-ventilated bathroom with east-facing window for positive energy and privacy. Integrated seamlessly into the floor plan.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A large arched entrance that provides natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A separate entryway for servants' quarters ensuring privacy.
